original_title: Sri Lanka’s economy grows by 1.6% in 3rd quarter of 2023
original_body_lines: Sri Lanka’s GDP for the third quarter of 2023 has increased to Rs. 2,946.1 billion from Rs. 2,900.6 billion recorded in the third quarter of 2022.
The year-on-year GDP growth rate for the third quarter of year 2023 has been reported as 1.6% of positive growth rate, the Census and Statistics Department said in its new report.
The agricultural, industrial and services activities expanded by 3.0%, 0.3% and 1.3% respectively in the third quarter of 2023.
